Package dao

Class OrderDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.AbstractDAO<Order>
dao.OrderDAO
public class OrderDAO extends AbstractDAO<Order>
The OrderDAO class is similar to ClientDAO and ProductDAO but includes its own specialized methods and more complex queries specifically designed for managing orders.

    • insert

      public static int insert(Client c, Product p, int quantity) throws Exception
      Returns an int value of the insertedId. It checks that the quantity sent as parameter has a smaller value than the object found in the products table so it can be added to orders,and then inserted
      Parameters:
